Moo::SortedChannel

Moo::SortedChannel Class Reference

This class implements the sorted channel, sorted objects are rendered after the main scene and the shimmer. More...

#include <visual_channels.hpp>

Detailed Description

This class implements the sorted channel, sorted objects are rendered after the main scene and the shimmer.

void Moo::SortedChannel::addDrawItem ( ChannelDrawItem *  pItem  )  [static]

This method adds a draw item to the sorted channel.

Parameters:
pItem the draw item to add

void Moo::SortedChannel::addItem ( VertexSnapshotPtr  pVSS,
PrimitivePtr  pPrimitives,
EffectMaterialPtr  pMaterial,
uint32  primitiveGroup,
float  zDistance,
StaticVertexColoursPtr  pStaticVertexColours 
) [virtual]

This method creates a draw item and adds it to the sorted channel.

Parameters:
pVSS VertextSnapshot containing the vertices to use for drawing.
pPrimitives the indices
pMaterial the material used by this item
primitiveGroup the primitiveGroup to draw
zDistance the sorting distance of this item
pStaticVertexColours the static vertex colours for this draw item.

Implements Moo::VisualChannel.

Reimplemented in Moo::InternalSortedChannel, and Moo::SortedShimmerChannel.
